content: after thought heel and toe recipe both the heel and toe are knit exactly the same please refer to my video on the polka dot creek you tube channel for a tutorial these instructions are for knitting in the round on circular needles do each round on both needles to complete a round round 1 knit 32 sts on each needle round 2 decrease round k1 ssk k until 3 sts left k2tog k1 30 sts on each needle repeat these rounds until there are 16 sts left on each needle knit one more round all knit sts and kitchener closed checklist round 1 knit round 2 decrease to 30sts round 3 knit round 4 decrease to 28sts round 5 knit round 6 decrease to 26sts round 7 knit round 8 decrease to 24sts round 9 knit round 10 decrease to 22sts round 11 knit round 12 decrease to 20sts round 13 knit round 14 decrease to 18sts round 15 knit round 16 decrease to 16sts round 17 knit kitchener closed cuff round 1 knit rounds 2-12 k2 p2 all around bind off with a stretchy bind off
